::: {.cell}

The current valid map is identified by **Map code and version**: F3.1.web.orig v1.0.


> Point locations of large reservoirs were obtained from water bodies tagged as 'reservoirs' in "reservoirs" in vector layers GLWD1 and GLWD2 of Lehner & DÃ¶ll (2004). These were mapped with a spatial buffer of 15 minutes, enabling reservoirs to be represented in 0.5 degree grid cells..

::: {.cell}

:::


You can download and use this file from the following sources:

- GitHub repository ([GeoJSON / TopoJSON versions in GitHUB](https://github.com/red-list-ecosystem/typology-map-data/blob/master/data/layers/F3.1.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json))
 - Zenodo repository (EFG map) ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG files](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090993))
 - Zenodo repository (bundle of maps) ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG versions in compressed file](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419))

::: {.cell}

:::

This section provides information about the valid indicative distribution map for the ecosystem functional group [**F3.1 Large reservoirs**](/efg-info/F3_1.qmd).


::: {.cell}

:::

## Available maps

These maps are considered current and valid indicative distribution maps for this ecosystem functional group.

- Web navigation (**code: F3.1.web.orig**, version v1.0) 
 - Indicative Map (**code: F3.1.WM.nwx**, version v1.0) 

## Map files

You can download geospatial data for this map from the following sources:

F3.1.web.orig (v1.0){target="gisdata"}: [GitHub repository](F3.1.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json) :: [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/F3.1.web.orig_v1.0.tif) :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419) :: [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090993) :: [GitHub repository](https://github.com/red-list-ecosystem/typology-map-data/blob/master/data/layers/F3.1.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json) :: [GitHub repository](layers/F3.1.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json) :: [Earth Engine assets](projects/earthengine-legacy/assets/users/jrferrerparis/IUCN-GET/L3_IndMaps/)
F3.1.WM.nwx (v1.0){target="gisdata"}: [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/F3.1.WM.nwx_v1.0.tif) :: [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.F3_1_WM_nwx)

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.
